name: WSC Real 09: World Snooker Championship
overview: WSC Real 09: World Snooker Championship features some of the top snooker tournaments including the Masters, China Open, UK Championship, Welsh Open, Pot Black Tournament, and the World Championship. Whilst playing these tournaments, the player will come up against some of snooker's big guns that include Ronnie O'Sullivan, Ding Junhui, Stephen Maguire, Peter Ebdon, and Graeme Dott. Like all snooker games of late, the player also has the ability to play several variations of pool including rotation, 3-ball, 8-ball, and 9-ball. The player can also take part in the official UK 8-Ball Championship. Also available to play is the Golden Cue tournament, a hybrid between snooker and pool that pits the best of the best against each other.
